instructions: From any Home screen, tap Browser . Tap the Menu key. Tap Settings . Tap Privacy and Security . Choose from the following: Tap Clear cache . Tap Clear all cookie data . Tap Clear history . Tap OK .

From any Home screen, tap Apps . Tap Chrome . Tap the Menu key. Tap Settings . Tap Privacy . Tap CLEAR BROWSING DATA . Choose from the following: Select the Clear browsing history check box. Select the Clear cookies, site data check box. Tap Clear
From any Home screen, tap Browser . Tap the + sign to add a tab. View the number of tabs in the upper right hand corner. Tap the X on any tab to close it.
From any Home screen, tap Apps . Tap Chrome . To add a tab, tap the Menu key and then tap New tab . View the number of tabs in the upper right hand corner. Tap the X on any tab to close it.
From any Home screen, tap Apps . Tap Camera . Tap the Camera Settings icon. Tap Storage . Select from the following: SD card Internal storage
From any Home screen, tap Browser . Tap the Menu key. Tap Settings . Tap Advanced. Select or clear the Enable JavaScript check box.
From any Home screen, tap Apps . Tap Chrome . Tap the Menu key. Tap Settings . Tap Content settings . Select or clear the Enable JavaScript check box.
